website_summaries.verdict: This model includes an extensive dictionary and thesaurus, and also offers a language translator option of commonly used phrases for travelers.
pros: The 58,000 word entries included with the dictionary is less than some models, but still covers virtually all commonly used words
Includes a large database of sample sentences for clarity
Language translator is the biggest advantage of this unit, with 26 languages available
cons: The robotic translator voice is difficult to understand, and users may be better off trying to speak the foreign phrases themselves

customer_reviews.title: absolute rubbish.
customer_reviews.text: No assistance in understanding how to use the device in the manual. I got the impression the product had been made by a child in a garage somewhere. On reading other reviews I would want to return and get my money back, but I can only believe the customer service is rubbish too and now they have my money they really don't care. This is massively overpriced and I get better value from free tutorials on my phone and on the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Grimley

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and under delivered!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to Germany in December and was totally unimpressed. The screen does not light up and is very hard to read. The robotic voice the company uses for their product is horrible! I mean really horrible! We have an exchange student that is staying with us from Freiburg and he couldn't even understand the translator. Save your money and buy some Berlitz audio cd's!
customer_reviews.author: TechHead

customer_reviews.title: I like giving this to students instead of Google Translate
customer_reviews.text: This does take about 5-7 minutes to load another language, but it has been a very helpful classroom resource in my English as a Second Language class. I can let a student use it to translate Tagalog for part of the class and let another student use it to translate in Spanish for the next part. Multiple languages are already pre-loaded. I like giving this to students instead of Google Translate, so they can use their own language skills and just look up one word or phrase at a time.
customer_reviews.author: CO Mom and Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that I could say or type a phrase or sentence and it would translate it for me which it does not. I am having trouble trying to negotiate through the programs. The instructions are not clear to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Great little device
customer_reviews.text: Very useful dictionary and phrase book. Used it constantly for German and Italian. The sound of the synthesized speech that comes directly from the device is not very good and I mostly didn't bother with it. However, it's fine with a headset. The calculator is peculiar and I still haven't figured out how to use it. A fun feature not related to translation at all is the study questions for US citizenship exam. Everyone who is already a US citizen would do well to make sure that he/she can answer them!
customer_reviews.author: Art and Judi

customer_reviews.title: Poor product...total lack of useflness
customer_reviews.text: This product does not do what it promised. There is very limited verbal function. To use it takes so much time and distrction that ordinary communication is not possible. The Spanish speakers are derisive of it. I put it aside and never used it again agter one day, I am in the middle of a 24 day trip for which I bought it, and this product is a waste of money. I will be very very cautious about buying any electronic product from Amazon, it was rated ver highly.....impossible for me to imagine how.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Boucher

customer_reviews.title: For One Way Conversation It May Be OK
customer_reviews.text: It is OK for basic use. The screen contrast is more difficult than I first thought, one needs a lamp or other light to see it very well. I must not have read the description correctly. I loaded the Thai program. I thought I would hear both English and Thai spoken words. The Thai is only written. So, it can help a Thai friend hear how an English word sounds but does not help me hear how the Thai word should sound.
customer_reviews.author: Alan L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good luck trying to actually communicate with someone of a ...
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I was expecting. Good luck trying to actually communicate with someone of a different language by using this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Ectaco 500AL
customer_reviews.text: Write up did not mention that you can only download 1 language pair at a time. Also the write-up said a carrying case would come with it, but it did not. I emailed them but have no response after several days. The voice sounds very robotic. I will check it out further over the next few days. The manual is not very detailed, and it takes a while to figure things out.
customer_reviews.author: purple

customer_reviews.title: excellent spelling check and dictionary and usefull dialogues
customer_reviews.text: dose what it says on the box meets all my needs
customer_reviews.author: stuart

customer_reviews.title: Translator
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband who is learning French. He seems to like to OK. Sometimes the audio is a bit hard to understand. Other than that, it seems to meet his needs.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E Day

customer_reviews.title: too complicated, wish to return it.
customer_reviews.text: I would like to return it, as we could not figure it out. We now have found a translate on Google that is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Metzger

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Translator
customer_reviews.text: The Ectaco translator is a good tool for anyone who is interested in speaking a language fluently. One can look up a word in the dictionary and hear the correct pronunciation of it from the translator. Also, there are many phrases to search for in the phrasebook.
customer_reviews.author: Landsky

customer_reviews.title: Not useful in Italy.
customer_reviews.text: Never was useful in real conversation. Sign language works better in practice, at least in Italy. Forget about electronic translators.
customer_reviews.author: Willard Wells

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: the worse part other than slow is the screen visibility, hard to read no back lite. do not order or refer this as junk, recent update. this product is worthless, will not save settings will give it away if you want it. Ectaco customer service told me to fuking off, don't wont my business!
customer_reviews.author: anthonyC

customer_reviews.title: Didn't live up to expectations
customer_reviews.text: While this device might be ideal for some, we were looking for something that would allow phrases to be translated. I think perhaps I had been misinformed as to it's capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: gretchen m mcpherson

customer_reviews.title: On line apt much better.
customer_reviews.text: I returned it, it turned out to be old version. On line apt much better.
customer_reviews.author: Ray S. Richards

customer_reviews.title: translator
customer_reviews.text: This is the best friend you can have when you are traveling and need help finding the right words. Was great for us to speek German and our German family to find the right English words!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from Ectaco........They do not know what they are doing and they are ignorant and rude.
customer_reviews.text: I tried to download the language software and talked to etaco for 8 days.....they kept bouncing me back and forth. After several phone calls and emails I was told to call tech support who I had talked to three times before. Nick in TS speaks a very accented english and is impossible to understand. He eventually transfered me to Robwho does not know this product and is a smart ass to boot. I regret having paid the money for this item and will be happy to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Soto

customer_reviews.title: In this case you don't get what you paid for...........
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply built, does not do what it is advertised to do. Hardly better than a written language translater. Bad sound.
customer_reviews.author: tombo

customer_reviews.title: Ectaco 500 al translator
customer_reviews.text: Yesterday I got my new translator and started to use it. I already tried english-spanish language pair (included) and russian-spanish pair (which was downloaded from ectaco site for free). It is really excellent! The translator helps to find the word by look up function so you don`t need to write all letters of the word, he offers several options of translation, can speak in all languages. The speach is very clear. The vocabulary also includes a lot of sentences very usefull for tourists. I am very excited!
customer_reviews.author: BellaS

customer_reviews.title: forget it
customer_reviews.text: item as described but its onlu translate one language , and you have to buy the softwear and pay another 50 / 60 dollars no way jose i return this and got a franklin that translate 14 language very very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Not the best translator!
customer_reviews.text: There are some major problems with this product. the biggest is that there are no screen lights! so unless u have a bright room 24/7, u cant read anything off the screen. which is a big deal to me. it means i cant use it at work, or at night when my gf is sleeping. in general i dont recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ata Etez

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother.
customer_reviews.text: This product was a waste of money. You get so much more with your iphone apps. for free! You are better off with a translating dictionary.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: One of the best translator on the market
customer_reviews.text: It is one of the best translators I have ever owned It has a 514,000 word dictionary grammar and everything you would want on learning a language.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is better than I expected, so many useful features.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY-awful customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought French-Russian one a month ago. Literally USELESS! Can't find any word I want, gives wrong definitions, very poor design. But wait, that's not it. I decided to return it 6 days after the delivery and called the customer service. They said that I can do it within 7 days and to wait for the instructions. Waited for a week, nothing. Then emailed them many times, called hundreds times- NO RESPONSE. And then two weeks later I got an email saying that it's too late to return. A month passed-still waiting, working on DISPUTE. DO NOT EVER NEVER BUY ANY ECTACO PRODUCT, PIECE OF SHI...T.
customer_reviews.author: Palvan

customer_reviews.title: The instruction book isn't even good for toilet paper and they don't respond when you ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely HOPELESS. You can type and record and see or hear what you typed (or said) but try getting it to translate! The instruction book isn't even good for toilet paper and they don't respond when you ask for help. I'm halfway through my trip to China - the SOLE reason I bought it and STILL haven't had any help in how to use the useless thing.
customer_reviews.author: TagMan

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: When I received mine it did not have a SD card in it and their support just told me to download it from their web site to a card. Most of the languages I picked did not work when installing gave me a err on the screen. One that did work Latin was not acutually Latin but Latvian. When going to their help site they will not respond to any of my emails. The device works fine but their web site is lacking and their is no support, so once you buy it your are on your own. I will be returning this product since I can't get the languages on it I want.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Multi-lingual, multi-function
customer_reviews.text: I picked up the 500AL with the intent to travel abroad (early planning stages, wasn't sure where I would go), and wanted to learn basic phrases in as many languages as possible. The down time when changing dictionaries is a bit long, but nothing terrible when you're just sitting teaching yourself. The text-to-speech voice is a bit robotic, made worse by the built-in speaker, but attaching a set of headphones helped that a bit. When my cousin started preparing for the SATs, was able to lend it out to help her boost her vocabulary.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tierney

customer_reviews.title: Great way to support fluency
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased the 500AL with the purpose of improving my grasp of the basics in various languages. Since my wife's uncle has come to stay with us, it has since been repurposed from teaching me foreign languages, to teaching him English. The preloaded English grammar and American idioms have been of a great help in him falling into more flowing conversation.
customer_reviews.author: Sky Greene

customer_reviews.title: what a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Does not even have basic words, what a waste of money, had others so I can compare, this item is shameful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The screen doesn't has a good contrast. Whit few light is not possible read the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Patricio

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy from ectaco! they dont answer emails calls ...
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy from ectaco ! they dont answer emails calls or allow any feedback on their website. The machine I received doe not do what its described to do.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R.

product_meta.title: Ectaco Partner 500AL PRO Dictionary and Audio Phrasebook
product_meta.description:
ECTACO 500AL Multilingual Translator
English Interface
Advanced English TTS speech synthesis pronounces any word
14,000 entry Audio PhraseBook enabled with English TTS pronunciation
English Phonetic transcription
Instant reverse translation
Look-up function
Advanced word recognition
Vector Ultima spell-checker
Slang Lock feature to exclude slang from translations 
English Irregular verbs
American English Idioms
Electronic English grammar bookSAT 200 and SAT 5000 vocabulary builders
Linguistic games including the ever-popular and effective Hangman
USA interview utility to help prepare for citizenship exams
English World Time clock
Calculator
Currency and Metric convertersEasy to read 255*160 dot LCD screen
Instant mini-USB PC connection
SD card
feature_bullets: Oxford E-E Dictionary (Oxford Advanced Learner's Dictionary (8th Edition)) containing approximately 58,000 words, phrases, and meanings and over 86,000 samples sentences with real voice pronunciation
Collins Cobuild Advanced Learner's English Dictionary (New Digital Edition) containing approximately 40,000 words with real voice pronunciation
Collins Thesaurus A-Z (2nd Edition) containing approximately 18,000 words with real voice pronunciation

Collins Multilingual Dictionary (26 Languages): Arabic, Chinese, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English (US), English (British), Finnish, French, German, Greek, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese (Brazilian) , Portuguese (Iberian), Russian, Spanish (Iberian), Spanish (Latin American), Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Vietnamese

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars51 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
